languages.text: "Тебя что-то тревожит, Кассия? Не бойся — я защищу тебя от любого еретика, осмелившегося покуситься на зрящую Его свет!"
"Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"
languages.original_text: "Тебя что-то тревожит, Кассия? Не бойся — я защищу тебя от любого еретика, осмелившихся покуситься на зрящую Его свет!"

traits.locale_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “莫非有什么事情让你感到困扰了吗，卡西娅？不要怕，我会保护你。若是有人胆敢冒犯凝视帝皇光辉之人，我必将消灭那些异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: “莫非有什么事情让你感到困扰了吗，卡西娅？不要怕，我会保护你。若是有人胆敢冒犯凝视帝皇光辉之人，我必将消灭那些异端分子！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Quelque chose vous tracasse, Cassia ? Ne craignez rien. Je tuerai tous les hérétiques qui oseraient s'en prendre à ceux qui vivent dans Sa lumière ! »
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose vous tracasse, Cassia ? Ne craignez rien. Je tuerai tous les hérétiques qui oseraient s'en prendre à ceux qui vivent dans Sa lumière ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Beunruhigt Euch etwas, Cassia? Seid unbesorgt, ich beschütze Euch vor allen Ketzern, die es wagen, seine Anhänger anzugreifen!"
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: "Beunruhigt Euch etwas, Cassia? Seid unbesorgt, ich beschütze Euch vor allen Ketzern, die es wagen, seine Anhänger anzugreifen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「心配事はないか、カシア？大丈夫――浅はかにも皇帝の光を見る者を侵す異端がどんなものだろうと、私が守ってみせる！」
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: 「心配事はないか、カシア？大丈夫――浅はかにも皇帝の光を見る者を侵す異端がどんなものだろうと、私が守ってみせる！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Le preocupa algo, Cassia? No tema, ¡la protegeré contra cualquier hereje que ose oponerse contra quienes ven la luz del Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Le preocupa algo, Cassia? No tema, ¡la protegeré contra cualquier hereje que ose oponerse contra quienes ven la luz del Emperador!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

languages.text: "Bir derdin mi var Cassia? Endişelenme, O'nun nurunu görenleri düşman belleyen kâfirlerden seni koruyacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Is something troubling you, Cassia? Fear not — I will protect you from any heretic who dares to trespass against those who see His light!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir derdin mi var Cassia? Endişelenme, O'nun nurunu görenleri düşman belleyen kâfirlerden seni koruyacağım!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
